description: No Tech for Tyrants (NT4T) launched a campaign called #RecruitMeNot in response to Dr. Timnit Gebru being censored and fired at Google for refusing to do unethical practices. Dr. Gebru was Google's Lead AI ethics researcher. The #RecruitMeNot campaign asks students and researchers to refuse recruitment and job offers from Google until they meet the basic demands outlined by its employees.
author: hyatt d.
